comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: We appreciate the heads up to CI on this issue since it's impacting testing broadly across multiple projects, but it looks like it will need to be fixed in the indivual projects using the pyparsing module so I'm marking it invalid for CI.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~fungi

comments.content: Marking invalid for heat also - the release of python-quantumclient 2.1.2 in pypi has fixed the issue for us
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~shardy
